channel.title: Let a different computer host same server?
channel.description: how do i get it so i can host my server under a different computer. same router. just a different computer. i have the files on this computer. i have the ports added for this computer. how do i do it though, it wont work it jsut stays connected to my other computer

item.title: Let a different computer host same server?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

uncheck the no-ip on the computer your using now…
and check it on the other one… and run the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Let a different computer host same server?
